panels.description: Sum of physiological parameter scores for userid = 10342.

targets.expr: kafka_consumer_bps{userid="10342", topic="processed-topic"} + kafka_consumer_pulse{userid="10342", topic="processed-topic"} + kafka_consumer_resp{userid="10342", topic="processed-topic"} + kafka_consumer_temp{userid="10342", topic="processed-topic"}

panels.title: User 10342: NEWS2

panels.description: Sum of physiological parameter scores for userid = 10342.

targets.expr: kafka_consumer_bps{userid="10342", topic="prink-topic"} + kafka_consumer_pulse{userid="10342", topic="prink-topic"} + kafka_consumer_resp{userid="10342", topic="prink-topic"} + kafka_consumer_temp{userid="10342", topic="prink-topic"}

panels.title: User 10342: NEWS2 ANON
